name: Little Boy - Lance's Ambulance
description:
Help Lance save injured people!

"A good set of extra activities related to story. The option to record your own narration. Multiple language versions included in the price. Ease of use. No distracting elements." (AppySmart)

"A series of beautiful stories for children to delve into a world familiar, reassuring and colorful. Kids may ask for more! Fortunately, they have choice." (ViPad.fr)

********************************

Based on the well-known collection of books "Little Boy" (over 500,000 books sold each year), the application "Lance's ambulance" features a fun, interactive story, giving kids a Lance to find out in a playful way what it's like to be an ambulance driver.

Ride on Lance's ambulance and drive injured people to the Emergency Room. Look for the sounds and interactive animations on the screen, then record your own voice instead of that of the narrator. Give your answers to the quiz and play with the jigsaw puzzles and the coloring books. And finally, why don't you take a picture of yourself with Lance's ambulance?

"Lance's ambulance" is a story where your child can identify with the hero and let his imagination wander.

• Interactive story for preschoolers
• Read or listen
• Record your own voice!
• Snap yourself in the ambulance!
• Quiz about Lance's story
• 5 jigsaw puzzles, 3 levels
• 5 coloring books.
• Have fun and learn new languages with texts and audio in English and French!
